      • lockApproval

        public static java.lang.String lockApproval(com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue issue)
        Lock issue for custom approval. Always use a try...finally block to unlock afterwards.
        Parameters:
        issue - Issue
        Returns:
        Lock Id. Use this value to unlock. If null, locking failed (someone else is editing).

      • unlockApproval

        public static boolean unlockApproval(com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue issue,
                                     java.lang.String lockId)
        Unlock issue for custom approval.
        Parameters:
        issue - Issue
        lockId - String, lock Id returned by lockApproval().
        Returns:
        boolean true if unlocking is successful.

      • setApprovalData

        public static void setApprovalData(com.atlassian.jira.user.ApplicationUser user,
                                   com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue issue,
                                   ApprovalData data)
        Update ApprovalData directly. Since approval history is stored in ApprovalData, you can alter them as well. You should update status accordingly. Use with caution.
        Parameters:
        user - Updating user.
        issue - Issue
        data - ApprovalData from getApprovalData().

      • approve

        public static void approve(com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue issue,
                           com.atlassian.jira.user.ApplicationUser user,
                           boolean approve)
                    throws LockException,
                           InvalidApproverException,
                           InvalidApprovalException,
                           InvalidWorkflowException,
                           com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowException
        Approve/reject current approval. Transit status is condition is matched.
        Parameters:
        issue - Issue
        user - ApplicationUser performing the action.
        approve - boolean, true to approve, false to reject.
        Throws:
        InvalidApprovalException - when ApprovalSettings is not valid
        LockException - when unable to lock issue
        InvalidApproverException - when provided user is not approver/delegate
        InvalidWorkflowException - when unable to locate transition for approval
        com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowException - when unable to transit issue

      • approve

        public static boolean approve(com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue issue,
                              ApprovalSettings settings,
                              com.atlassian.jira.user.ApplicationUser user,
                              boolean approve)
                       throws LockException,
                              InvalidApproverException,
                              InvalidApprovalException,
                              InvalidWorkflowException,
                              com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowException
        Approve/reject a specific approval. Transit status is condition is matched.
        Parameters:
        issue - Issue
        settings - ApprovalSettings of a specific approval.
        user - ApplicationUser performing the action.
        approve - boolean, true to approve, false to reject.
        Returns:
        boolean True if issue is transited.
        Throws:
        InvalidApprovalException - when ApprovalSettings is not valid
        LockException - when unable to lock issue
        InvalidApproverException - when provided user is not approver/delegate
        InvalidWorkflowException - when unable to locate transition for approval
        com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowException - when unable to transit issue

      • transitIssue

        public static boolean transitIssue(com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue issue,
                                   com.atlassian.jira.user.ApplicationUser user)
                            throws LockException,
                                   InvalidWorkflowException,
                                   com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowException
        Check if approval condition has been completed and transit issue.
        Parameters:
        issue - Issue
        user - User performing the action
        Returns:
        boolean True if issue has been transited
        Throws:
        LockException
        InvalidWorkflowException
        com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowException

      • createScheduledJob

        public static boolean createScheduledJob(long frequency)
        Create/replace schedule job to scan issue for custom approval that hasn't transited Such issues are caused by changing approver definition.
        Parameters:
        frequency - Job frequency in milliseconds. 0 to disable.
        Returns:
        boolean True if successful
